control.name: dataNavigator1
control.description: This controls is used to navigate through the records in a data source and perform operations against the data.

control.name: lookUpEdit1
control.description: This LookUp editor is bound to an external data source. The data is retrieved from the 'nwind.mdb' database which is shipped with the installation.

control.name: lookUpEdit2
control.description: This LookUp editor is bound to the 'ContactList' class inherited from Collection Base.

control.name: lookUpEdit3
control.description: This LookUp editor is bound to an array of Record objects.

control.name: lookUpEdit4
control.description: This LookUp editor is bound to an array of Record objects. It conains the '# (Not In List Column)' column whose field name ('NotInList') doesn't coincide with any fields from the data source. The GetNotInListValue event is handled to populate this unbound column.

control.name: seColumnIndex
control.description: This spin editor allows you to specify the index of a column against which the incremental search is performed when the 'Auto Complete" or 'OnlyInPopup' item is selected in the 'Search Mode' combo box.

control.name: icbHeaderClickMode
control.description: This combo box allows you to specify which functionality is invoked as a result of clicking a column header within the lookup editor's dropdown.

control.name: icbSearchMode
control.description: This combo box allows you to specify how end-users can search for specific rows by typing within the editor.

control.name: ceCaseSensitiveSearch
control.description: This check box controls whether an incremental search is case sensitive.

control.name: seItemHeight
control.description: This spin editor allows the height of rows in the dropdown to be specified, in pixels.

control.name: teNullText
control.description: This text editor allows you to enter a string which will be displayed in the edit box when the edit value is null.

control.name: ceHotTrack
control.description: This check box controls whether the items in the popup window are hot-tracked when the mouse pointer passes over them.

control.name: ceShowFooter
control.description: This check box shows or hides the footer region in the dropdown window.

control.name: ceShowHeader
control.description: This check box shows or hides the column headers.

control.name: ceShowLines
control.description: This check box shows or hides vertical lines that separate columns in the dropdown.

hint.name: lookUpEdit1
hint.hinttext: #KeyboardALT+DOWN, F4 to show or hide the dropdown listUP, DOWN keys to select the previous or next item#Other End-User ActionsUse the controls on the right pane to learn which additional end-user customization methods are available
